name: @wesley/generator-supabase
description: Wesley Supabase/PostgreSQL Generators - DDL, RLS, and pgTAP tests

scripts.test: bash -lc 'shopt -s globstar nullglob; files=(test/**/*.{test,spec}.{js,mjs,ts,tsx} src/**/*.{test,spec}.{js,mjs,ts,tsx}); has_any=0; for f in "${files[@]}"; do if grep -qE
"$f"; then has_any=1; break; fi; done; if [ $has_any -eq 1 ]; then vitest; else echo "No runnable tests in @wesley/generator-supabase; skipping"; fi'

author: Wesley Team
